large1.title: The Best 6 Putting Drills
large1.desc: Here I talk about my favorite 6 putting tips, I included 3 you can do at home while quarantining and 3 you can do when you finally get to the course next! Putting is also one of the most important techniques to master in golfing.

large2.title: Workouts for golfers
large2.desc: We all want to keep in shape so when we go back to golfing we can continue to smash the ball. Here are a couple of routines and workouts

large3.title: How to break 100?
large3.desc: The average golfer can't break 100. I believe that if you read this guide of 10 tips to breaking 100, you will be able to 100 with a bit of practice and a couple of rounds of applying these concepts
